Posts.Content: May 28, 2019 03:48AM aliciacantu84 wrote: hello everyone I had bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction one year ago, now ive been experiencing burning and shooting sensation it’s not super painful totally bearable but scary. Is this normal? I have it almost every night.. also pain and itching around the scars
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy Pain Syndrome (PMPS) Deeds Lezza13
